title: Feed for Thought: How to Successfully Wean Beef Calves

tasks.task: Provide information on successful cow-calf weaning.
subtasks: Explain the importance of minimizing environmental changes during weaning.
Suggest having a designated area for calves to eat prior to weaning.
Recommend the use of a creep gate to allow calves access to a supplemental feed.
Highlight the benefits of using high-quality alfalfa for weaning calves.
Specify the protein and relative feed quality requirements for alfalfa intended for calves.
Explain the difference between relative feed value and relative feed quality.
Emphasize the importance of highly digestible forage for young calves.
